restlib.net

Class UriEncoding

  • java.lang.Object
    • restlib.net.UriEncoding

  • public final class UriEncoding
extends Object
    Factory for generating Functions that can be used to encode and decode URI encoded strings.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Function<CharSequence,String> UTF8_DECODE
      A Function that decodes a URI encoded String using the UTF-8 charset.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Function<CharSequence,String> decoder(Predicate<Integer> codePointsToDecode, Charset charset)
      Returns a Function that decodes only the code points that match codePointsToDecode using the Charset charset.
      static Function<CharSequence,String> decoderUsingCharset(Charset charset)
      Returns a Function that decodes a URI encoded string using the Charset charset.
      static Function<CharSequence,String> encoder(Predicate<Integer> safeCodePoints, Charset charset)
      Returns a Function that URI encodes all code points in the inputs string except those matching safeCodePoints using the Charset charset.
      static Function<CharSequence,String> utf8Decoder(Predicate<Integer> codePointsToDecode)
      Returns a Function that decodes only the code points that match codePointsToDecode using the UTF-8 charset.
      static Function<CharSequence,String> utf8DecoderCharsOnly(Predicate<Character> charsToDecode)
      Returns a Function that decodes only the characters that match charsToDecode using the UTF-8 charset.
      static Function<CharSequence,String> utf8Encoder(Predicate<Integer> safeCodePoints)
      Returns a Function that URI encodes all code points in the inputs string except those matching safeCodePoints using the UTF-8 charset.
      static Function<CharSequence,String> utf8EncoderWithSafeChars(Predicate<Character> safeChars)
      Returns a Function that URI encodes all characters in the inputs string except those matching safeChars using the UTF-8 charset.

    • Field Detail

      • UTF8_DECODE

        public static final Function<CharSequence,String> UTF8_DECODE
        A Function that decodes a URI encoded String using the UTF-8 charset.

    • Method Detail

      • decoder

        public static Function<CharSequence,String> decoder(Predicate<Integer> codePointsToDecode,
                                    Charset charset)
        Returns a Function that decodes only the code points that match codePointsToDecode using the Charset charset.
        Parameters:
        codePointsToDecode - a Predicate matching all the codepoints that should be decoded by the decoder.
        charset - any non-null Charset
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if codePointsToDecode or charset are null.

      • decoderUsingCharset

        public static Function<CharSequence,String> decoderUsingCharset(Charset charset)
        Returns a Function that decodes a URI encoded string using the Charset charset.
        Parameters:
        charset - any non-null Charset
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if charset is null.

      • encoder

        public static Function<CharSequence,String> encoder(Predicate<Integer> safeCodePoints,
                                    Charset charset)
        Returns a Function that URI encodes all code points in the inputs string except those matching safeCodePoints using the Charset charset.
        Parameters:
        safeCodePoints - a Predicate matching all the code points that should not be encoded.
        charset - any non-null Charset
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if safeCodePoints or charset are null.

      • utf8Decoder

        public static Function<CharSequence,String> utf8Decoder(Predicate<Integer> codePointsToDecode)
        Returns a Function that decodes only the code points that match codePointsToDecode using the UTF-8 charset.
        Parameters:
        codePointsToDecode - a Predicate matching all the codepoints that should be decoded by the decoder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if codePointsToDecode.

      • utf8DecoderCharsOnly

        public static Function<CharSequence,String> utf8DecoderCharsOnly(Predicate<Character> charsToDecode)
        Returns a Function that decodes only the characters that match charsToDecode using the UTF-8 charset.
        Parameters:
        charsToDecode - a Predicate matching all the character that should be decoded by the decoder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if codePointsToDecode.

      • utf8Encoder

        public static Function<CharSequence,String> utf8Encoder(Predicate<Integer> safeCodePoints)
        Returns a Function that URI encodes all code points in the inputs string except those matching safeCodePoints using the UTF-8 charset.
        Parameters:
        safeCodePoints - a Predicate matching all the code points that should not be encoded.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if safeCodePoints is null.

      • utf8EncoderWithSafeChars

        public static Function<CharSequence,String> utf8EncoderWithSafeChars(Predicate<Character> safeChars)
        Returns a Function that URI encodes all characters in the inputs string except those matching safeChars using the UTF-8 charset.
        Parameters:
        safeChars - a Predicate matching all the code points that should not be encoded.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if safeChars is null.
